title: Chetvurta.vlast.S01E07.WEBRip.720.x264-TFA
description:
Chetvurta vlast

Director: Stoyan Radev , Dimitar Kotzev - ShoSho .

Writer: Vania Nikolova

Country: Bulgaria

Genre: Political thriller

Year : 2013

Duration: 52 minutes

Cast: Milla Parusheva , Hristo Shopov , Samuel Finzi , Vladimir Penev, Michael Bilalov , Deyan Donkov , Atanas Atanasov, Ivaylo Geraskov Vladimir Karamazov Hristo Petkov Snejina Petrova , Svetlana Iancheva Anna Papadopoulou , Alexandra Vassileva, Dessi Morales and others. Scenarios team includes Alexander Tchobanov Alexander Spassov , Vania Nikolova Velislava Popova, Emil Andreev, Jordan Banks, Rosen Bosev Dimitar Kotzev - ShoSho and Stoyan Radev .



Summary : Fourth government 's television series in the genre of political thriller. Movie full of action and uncertainty where clandestine government agencies , politicians and the media are often pitted against each other in the service of diverse interests and secrets .

The main storyline of the film revolves around the work of investigative journalists in a newspaper whose name is actually the name of the movie "The Fourth Power" .

In the version of the newspaper " Fourth Power" every day is a frenetic race in search of news. Journalists gather daily massive amount of information sources , articles and various rumors. Their work is a race against time to determine the headlines , which often becomes the cause of strife, bringing confusion in the work ethic .

Journalists dedicate and risk their lives in some of the investigations. All worth it to get to the news of the day or unpublished interview !

In the episodes that form this series will emerge interesting topics such as: what are the mechanisms to influence the media? Could the media to influence society? What is the role of the secret services in the media? Should journalists at any cost to comply with the work ethic and standards of the profession ? Or where the line between objective news and tabloids ?
